Posts.Content: Aug 8, 2007 09:18PM mtlion322 wrote: Dobie, I am with nash, I found a lump due to breast pain and had I not showed the breast center where my lump was the mammo and u/s would not have picked the lump up, it loves to hide! I had the mri done and not only did it show its ugly head, but showed other area's and after my surgery everything the mri showed was there and more!
Posts.Title: From DCIS to ILC- advice needed dobie iodine
